hybrid_details.question: Why did the Operating revenues decreased from 2018 to 2019? ...
hybrid_details.context_preview:
Table ID: 806ac467-ab50-428b-8584-baef6d6c4cee
Headers:  |  | Years Ended December 31, | 
Row 1:  | 2017 | 2018 | 2019
Row 2:  | % | % | %
Row 3: Operating revenues | 100.0 | 100.0 | 100.0
Row 4: Oper...
answer: primarily due to decreased other operating revenues, decreased foundry wafer sale, and 2.5% depreciation of the NTD in 2019 from 2018.

hybrid_details.question: Why did the Operating costs decreased from 2018 to 2019?...
hybrid_details.context_preview:
Table ID: 806ac467-ab50-428b-8584-baef6d6c4cee
Headers:  |  | Years Ended December 31, | 
Row 1:  | 2017 | 2018 | 2019
Row 2:  | % | % | %
Row 3: Operating revenues | 100.0 | 100.0 | 100.0
Row 4: Oper...
answer: primarily due to the decreased depreciation expense and other operating costs, which was partially offset by the increased direct material costs.
